CATS EVERYWHERE!: A whole bunch of new cats have come over! The `cat` command will now show you pictures of new cats!
The `cat` command won't give errors and prevent you from seeing cats anymore. You can now see cat pics whenever you want!
Overwatch Overhauls: You can now also see the hero that the player mains in competitive play or quick play in Overwatch, with the `overwatch` command.
Removed Achievements section from the Overwatch stats as that was not really necessary and just used too much space.
